about_the_game:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

A Combat Suit for Vanguards charging at the forefront of battle.

Included Costume: Look the part soldier! ‘Vanguard Combat Suit Set’
- Vanguard Combat Suit x 1
- Vanguard Mask x 1
- Vanguard Cloak x 1
- Vanguard Gloves (R) x 1
- Vanguard Gloves (L) x 1
- Vanguard Shoes x 1

name: KurtzPel - Vanguard Combat Suit Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

short_description: ※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable. A Combat Suit for Vanguards charging at the forefront of battle.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
